name: IBOANN 3 Pack Blue Light Blocking Glasses Women/Men, Round Fashion Retro Frame, Vintage Fake Eyeglasses with Clear Lens
reviews: The IBOANN 3 Pack Blue Light Blocking Glasses has become an essential accessory for my work routine, offering a stylish and effective solution to combat the strain caused by prolonged screen exposure. These glasses, with their round fashion retro frames and vintage aesthetic, not only elevate my style but also contribute to preventing headaches during long hours in front of the computer. I've also received many compliments on them!The standout feature of these glasses is their blue light blocking technology, which helps alleviate the strain caused by extended screen time. As someone who spends hours working on a computer, I have noticed a significant reduction in eye fatigue and headaches since incorporating these glasses into my daily routine.The round fashion retro frames add a touch of vintage flair, making these glasses a fashionable accessory that seamlessly integrates into my professional look. The clear lenses maintain a sleek appearance while effectively filtering out harmful blue light, ensuring that I can wear them throughout the workday without compromising on style.The lightweight design of the glasses adds to their comfort, allowing me to wear them for extended periods without feeling any pressure or discomfort on my nose or ears. The frames are sturdy and well-made, providing durability that withstands daily use.The three-pack option is a convenient addition, offering versatility in style while allowing me to keep a pair at different locations, such as my home office and workplace. The affordability of the pack makes it an accessible solution for those seeking reliable blue light protection without breaking the bank.In terms of effectiveness, I've noticed a marked improvement in my overall well-being during and after work hours. The reduction in eye strain and headaches has made a noticeable impact on my productivity and comfort, validating the efficacy of the blue light blocking technology.In conclusion, the Blue Light Blocking Glasses strikes the perfect balance between style and functionality. Their retro frames and clear lenses contribute to a fashionable look, while the blue light blocking technology delivers on its promise to prevent headaches and eye strain during prolonged computer use. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a stylish and effective solution to enhance screen time comfort.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023

name: IBOANN 3 Pack Blue Light Blocking Glasses Women/Men, Round Fashion Retro Frame, Vintage Fake Eyeglasses with Clear Lens
reviews: I recently purchased the blue light-blocking glasses and I've been quite impressed with their effectiveness. They're stylish and comfortable to wear for extended periods, and I've noticed a significant reduction in eye strain and headaches since using them. The lenses are clear and don't distort colors, which is a big plus. However, from my experience, the frame feels a bit flimsy and could be sturdier for long-term use. Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase and recommend them to anyone looking for reliable blue light protection.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023

name: IBOANN 3 Pack Blue Light Blocking Glasses Women/Men, Round Fashion Retro Frame, Vintage Fake Eyeglasses with Clear Lens
reviews: So cute and flattering. Not flimsy per say but not the best quality plastic either. Idk if there’s any actual research to support the supposed benefits of blue light glasses BUT I will say that when I’m at work, if I start to get a headache I will put these on and it makes it better. Maybe it’s some kind of placebo effect but who cares. If anything it gives the world a slight warm tint which is kinda nice when you’re sitting in dull gray office all day. Ngl I Love these and I’d recommend. I keep one pair at work, one at home and one in my backpack for school and It’s nice to have diff styles to switch things up!

These glasses allow me a longer period of time to use my electronics before my eyes become too fatigued.  So... it isn't perfection, but the glasses sure help!

reviews: I use these every day.  Most of my work (and play) time is spent on the computer, so I used to get blue light headaches something terrible.  I bought a different set of blue light blocking glasses over Covid lockdown, when literally everything I did was online, but by this summer (2023), each of the five original pairs had been broken, misplaced, or had lost their potency.  I needed a new set.After looking at a bunch of different sets, I decided on these because I liked the colors and the style of the frames.  Turns out I look pretty good in large frames.  I've gotten a ton of compliments on them, and I don't get many headaches, either.
